channel.title: Bits and Pieces on Torbjørn Bakken Pedersen's home page
channel.description: Recent content in Bits and Pieces on Torbjørn Bakken Pedersen's home page

item.title: Risoprint "Utsikten"
item.description: Three layer risoprint of a photography processed using Stochaster.

item.title: Pleasuredome backdrops
item.description: Video backdrops for a club night at Lokal bar, Trondheim. Made using the LZX Vidiot, 3trinsRGB+1c, BPMC premium cable and an assortment of video mixers. Youtube excerpts

item.title: Getaway boat
item.description: Music video/visuals for KEVINTHECREEP - Getaway boat. Made with a simple sound reactive LZX Vidiot patch and a BPMC Premium Cable. Youtube

item.title: Cherokee '93
item.description: Mix of southern 90s rap, with an emphasis on Memphis. Micro run of 20 tapes made at Tapedub, Berlin. Bandcamp

item.title: The joys of drinking tea
item.description: Ten years ago I did not drink tea. It’s not that I wasn’t exposed to it, the bitter drink just never really caught my attention. Around 2013 something clicked though, and I became utterly fascinated by Chinese tea and tea culture. I can’t remember exactly what triggered the interest, but it was something I read about puerh LEGG TIL LENKE tea. I think it might have been some texts about or from the artist Lars Holdhus/TCF.
